revision.text: specifically dependent continuant the color of a tomato the disposition of fish to decay the function of the heart in the body: to pump blood, to receive de-oxygenated and oxygenated blood, etc. the liquidity of blood the mass of a cloud the role of being a doctor the smell of mozzarella A continuantthat inheres in or is borne by other entities. Every instance of A requires some specific instance of B which must always be the same. Un continuant qui est inhérent ou est à la charge d'autres entités. Chaque instance de A nécessite une instance particulière de B qui doit toujours être identique. Jean-Marc Meunier mode property trope {{ #viki:pageTitles=Continuant spécifiquement dépendant}}[http://localhost/mediawiki-1.34.1/index.php/dépendant is a subclass from Continuant dépendant ]
